title: Longest Palindromic Substring (Expand Around Center)
subtitle: Find the longest contiguous palindrome in a string efficiently
code: while left >= 0 and right < len(s) and s[left] == s[right]:
additional_information: This method finds the longest palindrome by expanding around each character (and between characters) to check for odd and even length palindromes, achieving O(N^2) time with O(1) space.
